title: Timucuan Ecological & Historic Preserve: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Educational Groups Reservations are taken for groups planning to visit Fort Caroline (904.641.7155), Kingsley Plantation (904.251.3537), and the Ribault Club (904.251.2802).  House Tours Reservations for Kingsley Plantation weekend house tours can be made in person or over the phone at 904.251.3537. Tours are limited to groups of 12 due to structural restrictions.  The tour is offered free of charge but reservations should be made in advance.  House tours are given twice daily at 11:00 A.M. and 3:00 P.M. on Saturday and Sunday excluding those days with special events. The planter's home is closed on weekdays.      Permits   Permits are required for special uses or activities at the park sites.   Special uses include, but are not limited to:    Weddings  Commercial photography  Commercial tours  Application for Special Use Permits    For more information about permitting, call Park Ranger Craig Morris at 904.641.7155.   Learn about conducting research in the Timucuan Preserve.
